ldnd5e.title: Lemurian D&D 5º Ed. Control
ldnd5e.frControlMessage: As this item was completely destroyed, to repair it the price will be double the original price. Want to proceed anyway?

supplies.title: Supplies Configuration
supplies.urbanHint: If the army has access to a city, it becomes immune to the effects of Shortage for a certain period of time, limited by the size of the city's stockpiles. A city's stockpiles are only used if the army has not reached its minimum Supply level with the resources available in the region.

company.restResult: {name} rested successfully, restoring {stamina} points of stamina.{restoration}
company.hasRestoration: It's Medical Unit restored {total} points of moral losted in the previous battle.
company.fatigueRest: The company always restore its stamina level to max after completing a rest.
company.noRestTatics: This company's medical unit has no valid Restauration Tatics. Because of that the company is unable to restore any of its lost units from the last battle.

unit.categoryDescription: Each unit category has Base Attributes, in which the general needs to have a value of 13 or higher in at least one of them in order to efficiently control the unit.

battle.resetConfirm: This will clear all the current battle data.

extraRoll.title: Choose Roll Mode
extraRoll.message: Do you want to roll only the main roll or also an extra roll?

messages.bldgDmgLightArmor: Light Armor is immune to damage caused by Bludgening Damage.
messages.slshDmgHeavyArmor: Heavy Armor is immune to damage caused by Slashing Damage.
messages.newDLMessage: New Damage Level on {owner} equipment. This item now has a {penalty} AC penalty. {extra}
messages.maxDLMessage: {item} has already reached its maximum damage level and has been destroyed.
messages.fithDLMessage: Attackers now have advantage on attack rolls against {owner}.
messages.repairToExpensive: {actor} does not have enough money to carry out this repair.
messages.repairMessage: {item} has been successfully repaired. This item now has a {penalty} AC penalty.
messages.repairFailed: {item} cannot be repaired. The separate cost for the repair was lost.
messages.noTool: It is necessary to have a Smith's Tools to repair this item.
messages.arControlLabel: Do you want {action} in {value} penalty point for all {actor} tests?
messages.arControlLabelObs: NOTE: The penalty only increases the Critical Failure threshold.
messages.arMaxedOut: {actor}'s Critical Failure threshold is already at its maximum. Performing an agile reaction will now increase your exhaustion level by 1.
messages.fatigueMessage: {owner} is fatigued and took a long rest. Check if he managed to catch his breath a little for the next battles.
messages.maxFatigueMessage: {owner} is very fatigued and has succumbed to tiredness. Your hit points drop to 0, making you unconscious.
messages.fatigueGained: The battle is taking its toll on {owner}'s body. The last attack earned him 1 Fatigue point. Your AC penalty is now {penalty}.
messages.fatigueLost: {owner} has rested completely and lost {amount} Fatigue point(s). Your AC penalty is now {penalty}.
messages.addUnitLabel: Do you want to add {unit} to a Company battalion?
messages.dismissUnitLabel: Do you wish to dismiss {unit} from your battalion in the Company?
messages.noActiveCombat: It is not possible to use an Agile Reaction when there is no valid active combat.
messages.nonCobatantActor: {actor} is not a combatant and cannot use Agile Reactions.
messages.noBothEffects: Both of {actor}'s Active Effects (Armor and Shield) are malfunctioning. Active Effects have been recreated.
messages.noArmorEffect: {actor}'s Armor Active Effect is malfunctioning. Active Effect has been recreated.
messages.noShieldEffect: The Active Effect for {actor}'s Shields is malfunctioning. Active Effect has been recreated.
messages.noEffectErrors: No Actor had errors in their Active Effects.
messages.invalidActorOnBattle: {actor} is invalid and cannot be added to the battle.
messages.emptyBattleData: Impossible to continue. The battle data is empty.
messages.fullHand: You cannot draw any more cards because your hand is full.
messages.emptyDeck: You cannot draw any more cards because the draw deck is empty.
messages.noMainActivity: A Tática não possui nenhuma Atividade marcada como principal.

settings.hideFromGMHint: Hides the Armor Damage Active Effects controls from the GM. By default, only the GM has access to the controls.
settings.criticalHint: Makes a critical hit a little more deadly by multiplying the Damage Dice rolls (ignores any modifiers).
settings.massCombatHint: Enables Character Sheets for the Massive Combat System.
settings.exhaustionHint: Use new Exhaustion rule proposed by the One D&D system. '-1' on d20 rolls for each level of exhaustion.
settings.extraConditionsHint: Weapons can cause Extra Conditions on sucessful attacks.
